pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:6.2: At that time the nuns gave the full ordination to a woman who was breastfeeding.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:6.5: “Give almsfood to the nun. She has a companion.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:6.7: “How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.2: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.4: “How can nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.8: How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:8.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:10.2: she is a mother or a wet-nurse.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:12.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:12.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:12.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:12.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:12.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.1: If she is breastfeeding, and she perceives her as breastfeeding, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.2: If she is breastfeeding, but she is unsure if she is, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.3: If she is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as breastfeeding, and she gives her the full ordination, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.4: If she is not breastfeeding, but she perceives her as breastfeeding, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.5: If she is not breastfeeding, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:13.6: If she is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as breastfeeding, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:14.2: if she is the first offender.
